channel.title: About on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in About on See Hiong's Blog

item.description:
About Me

Iâ€™m an infrastructure and AI enthusiast with a focus on cloud-native technologies, AI integration, and automation. My blog documents my journey through Kubernetes orchestration, scalable AI/ML solutions, and modern CI/CD pipelines.

  • Kubernetes Ecosystem: From managing K3s clusters to deploying distributed applications with MicroK8s, I streamline cloud infrastructure for reliability and scale.

  • AI/ML Integrations: I specialize in deploying models like LLaMA, GPT4All, and Langchain4j, optimizing MLOps with Kubeflow, and integrating real-time AI workflows into Kubernetes.
